# Ametrine

> A modern digital garden and personal knowledge base built with Astro

## Overview

Ametrine is a static site generator optimized for note-taking and knowledge management, inspired by Obsidian and designed for personal digital gardens. It transforms markdown notes into a beautiful, interconnected website with advanced features.

## Key Features

- **Obsidian-Compatible**: Full support for wikilinks, internal linking, and graph visualization
- **Markdown-First**: Write in plain markdown with frontmatter metadata
- **Advanced Note Features**:
  - Marginalia (side notes and annotations)
  - Bases (database-style views with filtering and sorting)
  - Citations and backlinks
  - Reading time and metrics
- **Modern Tech Stack**: Built with Astro 5, React 19, TypeScript
- **Performance**: Static site generation with view transitions
- **Full-Text Search**: Client-side search with instant results
- **Link Previews**: Hover previews for internal links

## Content Structure

This site follows a digital garden philosophy:
- **Notes**: Individual markdown files with metadata
- **Tags**: Topical organization (demo, features, documentation, guide, etc.)
- **Bases**: Dynamic collections and filtered views
- **Graph**: Visual representation of note connections

## Technical Details

- **Framework**: Astro 5.15+ (SSG mode)
- **Content**: Markdown with YAML frontmatter
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom theme system
- **Interactivity**: React islands for dynamic components
- **Build Output**: Fully static HTML/CSS/JS

## Best Use Cases

Ametrine is ideal for:
- Personal knowledge bases and second brains
- Technical documentation sites
- Developer portfolios with notes/blog
- Research and study notes
- Digital gardens and evergreen content
